external_references.description: Douglas Bienstock. (2022, August 18). You Can’t Audit Me: APT29 Continues Targeting Microsoft 365. Retrieved February 23, 2023.

description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used residential proxies, including Azure Virtual Machines, to obfuscate their access to victim environments.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Microsoft 365 2022)
